project.Title: Candlemaker Hero
project.UpdateDetails: Blazing star heal disable can no longer be removed. Wild and poised are active at exactly 50 light. Vary light to make 50 difficult to get to. Boogeymen now applies horror. Complete rework of mere trickery
project.ItemDescription: The Candlemaker plays with light the way others do with movement. He rewards a cyclic play style with big moments of power.
